interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Jaw Exerciser | Face Exerciser Ball | | Double Chin Reducer | Sculpt jaw chew lanyard included | Look Younger, slim tone, | jawline exerciser|50Lb. Resistance Review Date: 2021/02/21 Store: HOP SKIP Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '1.89 x 1.73 x 1.61 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004890928'} Review Text: So, I saw something like this on TV and thought, 'Why not?' What guy wouldn't want to try something out that could lead to a manlier, chiseled looking jawline with just a few minutes of effort a day. I thought the people in the ad looked ridiculous, and however ridiculous they looked, I feel even more ridiculous using this thing. One big benefit is that if I ever get into an argument with my wife, I can break through even her angriest moments by popping this thing into my mouth for a little exercise in front of her. She can't help but laugh! Seriously, this thing has helped me reduce conflict in my marriage, which is probably worth an extra star, but...

It's not very comfortable to use. I don't have issues with TMJ, but repeatedly opening and closing my mouth around these purported 40lbs of resistance leads to some pretty unpleasant soreness after about a minute or two. It hasn't gotten better with repeated use. In any case, I keep trying because it doesn't seem to be doing any damage. In the end, I haven't really noticed much in the way of increased chiseling after a month of use, but I guess I'll keep trying. The product is well made for its purpose, but remember, you'll look pretty ridiculous using it. Review Title: You'll look more ridiculous than with shake weight or whatever other novelty workout item... Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Black Wolf - Men’s Ultra Hydrating Moisturizer - 1.7 Fl Oz – Soothe Dry, Patchy & Flaky Areas on your Skin - Fast Absorbing Formula Won't Feel Heavy or Greasy - Sulfate Free for Dry Skin Black Wolf {'Brand': 'Black Wolf', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.15 x 1.46 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BLKWLF_MOIST_DRY', 'UPC': '850021340087'} My face goes from oilier in the summer to dryer in the winter, so I haven't had a chance to fully experience the benefits of this in the season that I will need it most. To sample it for now, I actually applied it to my hands and elbows, which suffer from some dryness year-round. The results have been great! Any roughness has dissipated easily with daily application. I may save the rest for my face for the winter, but I'm really happy with what it's done so far. The moisturizer is faintly blue, opaque, and creamy. It smells more like a lotion, but it's still a pleasant aroma. Overall, this one is definitely recommended because I have quickly seen how well it works on dry skin. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Type:** Predominantly dry, with seasonal variation (oily in summer, dry in winter).
- **Product Preference:** Favors moisturizers effective for dry skin, with a focus on fast-absorbing, non-greasy formulas.
- **Scent Preference:** Prefers products with pleasant, subtle aromas, indicative of a preference for enjoyable sensory experiences.
- **Application Areas:** Looks for versatility in products, applying them on facial skin and other areas (hands, elbows) suffering from dryness.
- **User Behavior:** Tends to trial products on less visible areas before committing to full application (testing on hands/elbows before facial use). Recently engaged with fitness products related to facial aesthetics, indicating an interest in overall appearance.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Seeks high-quality, effective solutions confirmed by previous positive results, but may express ambivalence about products that don't meet expectations despite potential benefits.
- **Future Considerations:** Open to trying products based on their performance across different areas and seasons, suggesting adaptability in skincare and wellness routines.

This profile reflects a proactive user who not only prioritizes skincare but is also exploring broader aspects of personal appearance, while maintaining an emphasis on comfort and effectiveness in their routines.
